DOC.detailed_description: Healthy volunteer ( n=105 ) participate randomized double-blind , placebo-controlled , cross-over trial . Heat pain threshold intensity , cold pain threshold , response tonic cold pain ( latency , intensity , tolerance ) evaluate 120 min administration 1.5 mg apomorphine/placebo . A polymorphism ( DAT-1 ) within dopamine transporter gene ( SLC6A3 ) investigate .
